title: Understanding PivotChart Types
text: PivotCharts in Excel support most chart types, but there are a few exceptions. Consider which types might not be suitable for data summarization.

title: Think About Data Representation
text: Some chart types are more suited for specific data representations, like showing trends or distributions. Which chart types might not fit well with PivotCharts?

hintAnswer: most, except scatter (X,Y), stock, and bubble
title: Identify Unsupported Chart Types
text: List the chart types that are not supported by PivotCharts.
choices: most, except scatter (X,Y), stock, and bubble
only $$3-D$$ cylinder, clustered column charts, and bubble
